ygData.subject: Re: Some Verant feedback i got
ygData.msgSnippet: WOW what a bunch of winning babys Christ...I thought this was going to be a fun list. I would never be good enough NEVER! ... Get free personalized email from
ygData.messageBody:
WOW what a bunch of winning babys Christ...I thought this was going to be a fun list. I would never be good
enough NEVER!


---- you wrote:
> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
> Karim wrote:
>
> <snip of talk with GZ>
>
> It looks like the situation is pretty bad, and the people at Verant just
> don't give a damn.
>
> Maybe we should do something. Maybe a mass petition or something, because it
> looks like they don't even understand how the game works, and the difference
> between grouping and soloing. I almost get the feeling they just listened to
> the complaints in beta and gave no thought of their own to the outcome. Then
> when beta ended, we're screwed.
>
> What say you, fellow Wizards?
>
> --
> Qenelin
